reviews.sentence: Rooms were outdated and bedbugs found in one room which my guess traveling with my family was bitten several times. This has never happen at that brand before to mLocation was great for my visitTake it off your list.
Nothing I had numerous problems with room and checking in and out and overcharging.

Location price and breakfast were good. Breakfast good. Bathrom toilet did not work right. Kids running up and down the hall very noisey. Must have been owners relatives because they did not belong there. 10 to 12 kids.
Its ok outdoor pool. Small tvs meh.
Fair. Rooms had residual uncleanliness. Mattresses were sagy. Bedding was old.

Great stay and price was even better. I booked my room for 4 nights. Upon check in everything was ready to go. I was checked in very quickly. I was on the 3rd floor and was apprehensive about having to wait on the elevator a long time but this was not the case. It was very quick every time. There are alot of contractors that stay here while doing jobs locally but all my experiences with them were great. Unlike other guests who acted like this was an issue when they reviewed this hotel I found them quite pleasant and rarely there anyway because they work all day. All emenities in the room functioned as they should except for the faucet in the bathroom. I had hot and cold water but the lines were reversed. So initially I thought I had no hot water but when I went to brush my teeth I found the hot water on the right side instead of the left side like normal. Kinda comical but not inconvenient at all. I do not know the staffs names but I was treated great from the time I arrived until check out. The night clerks even offered tips on helping me to fall asleep. I was having difficulty going to sleep even before my stay. Free breakfast was good and I consumed many of the sausage patties they were great. Fresh fruits and breads available topped it all off nicely. There was events going on in the conference center parties really but they did not interrupt my sleep or my stay at all. Everyone was having a good time. The hotel is a lil dated but kept up. Thumbs up and many kudos to the ladies on overnight shift.

Checked in was fine and friendly. I had another crew come the following day after driving 9 hrs and could n’t get in room due to door closure broken off of door and hanging by the metal door frame. I requested another room to no avail but management requested my crew stay in a room that ’s half apart. Will be here in this town for 3 weeks working but will check out 1st thing in the morning. Good bye Rodeway INN.

I am currently in my room as I write. I honestly do not want to stay here tonight and really wish I could ask for my money back. I stayed at Home wood by Hilton hotel last night and it was amazing. We decided to stay together another night so we looked for something cheaper and found this. To start when I pulled in the place looked as if it was not operating. I pulled to the front of the door and had to back all the way out because the staff had their cars parked right in front of the door. The lady at the front desk had the nastiest attitude. I do not remember her but she has full lips a ring in her lip she smokes cigarettes and drives a silver altima that is beat up along the side. the Hall way smelled horrible and the elevator was worst. The front desk agent stressed the fact that there was to be no smoking. but the hallways reaked of cigarette smoke. Everything appeared to be out of order. The recycling bins etc were nasty as hell. We booked at about 1 pm and came back around 3 and our room was still being cleaned. The housekeeping lady was very nonchalant but she did try to call the front desk and no one answered BC the staff was outside smoking. We had to walk all the way back to the front desk. No ever apologized or anything. The inside of just makes my skin crawl. I really just want to leave and go somewhere else but I am sure i would have to move mountains in order for that to happen. Im very disgusted at this point.

A bunch of bs. Never stay. Staff was rude. Room was not cleaned my entire stay. They tried to charge my card 420 after I checked out because they claimed I smoked in the room. I do not even smoke. They say housekeeping reported it but they did n’t even come to clean my room. When I called to see why they were charging my card the man ignored the call 5 times. When I finally did get an answer and asked why he made up the story that I was smoking I honestly think he was trying to charge my card for his own personal benefit. When I asked for a name he replied “ Tina ” and “ Tika ”. Little do they know I come from a family of lawyers and I am going to see to it that this is resolved. I will be calling Choice hotels today.

Would love to stay again if and when I visit Greenville again. Love the bed and the extra pillows. The room size was great. The bathroom size was nice. Bathroom needed more care hair on the floor coffee pot dirty along with inside of the refrigerator.
Really nice place easy access to Major highways. Needs a bigger road sign. Location good rooms excellent staff. Still being renovated on ground floor.

Alright hotel. It was hard to find the entrance and the hotel is under construction so the elevator is n’t working. Not willing to offer a later checkout. But overall the hotel was like a 6 or 7 out of 10. At least the room was clean and It worked for the one night I needed it.
Exceptional. Staff was very nice and helpful. Room was clean and the breakfast was free and fabulous.
It was an incredible stay the hotel staff was extremely nice the rooms were clean and it was all new and great vibes.

Good. Beds were very comfortable. Rooms were newly remodeled clean. Housekeeping did not leave any bath towels on 2 of the 3 days they cleaned. Door to our room would not close unles we slammed it a couple times. Hotel was difficult to find as it is hidden behind a car dealership signage is very small.

It was what we have come to expect from previous stays at other Country Inn Suites Desk clerk Stace Jordan was amazing so friendly and helpful and Linda in the breakfast room went above and beyond offering to make the waffles for guests and keeping everything filled and so very clean. And of course the cookies were always plentiful and fresh. The property was very clean and well appointed and the breakfast was varied and plentiful. It was very difficult to find the driveway to the property. I went by it 3 times and had to keep turning around trying to find the entrance. The manager told me a new sign was due to be installed the following week. That the pool was closed. After traveling 650 miles south to get me some sun I was a little disappointed that the outdoor pool was already closed but I was still able to sit polside in the sun to relax and read.
Enjoyed a clean comfortable quiet stay. Room was clean and comfortable. Hot Breakfast was a little cool.
Good. Updated facility convenient to 85Didn’t clean room after 1st day. Billed us for 4 days instead of 2. Security deposit 25 per day.
Wonderful. Comfortable room bed breakfast was good. A bit far from the center but knew that upon renting the room. Nothing to complain about.
